About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

Objective

Driven professional with broad technical skill-set and strong attention to detail. Employs the latest technologies and following compliance with W3C guidelines and Section 508 accessibility standards.

  • Technologies: HTML5, CSS3, SASS/SCSS/Gulp, Node.js, Bootstrap4, JavaScript, jQuery, Ruby-on-Rails, AJAX, JSON, XML
  • Frameworks and Databases: Rails, React.js, MySQL, Postgresql, sqlite3.
  • Development Tools: GitHub, Rubymine, VS Code, Adobe Suite (PS, etc.).
  • Methodologies: Object Oriented Design, TDD, Agile.

MDLIVE, Inc.

Full Stack Developer, 04/2015 – Present

  • Refactor existing code and integrated new design and components, using Ruby-on-Rails, React.js, HTML5, CSS3, SASS/SCSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, jQuery, etc.
  • Participated in Patient Portal project using React.js, Node.js, Bower, SASS/SCSS, etc.
  • Created hundreds of landing pages and marketing materials.
  • Utilizing mobile-responsive design with and without external libraries.
  • Implementing web-accessibility standards into an existing and new website.
  • Participated in project planning meetings with account managers and product owners.
  • Coached new hires and junior developers, created multiple handouts and documentations for Account Managers, such as Affiliation Manager Tool Guide, MDLIVE Template Guide, etc.
